faqs.question: How often should I have professional teeth cleaning?
faqs.answer: We recommend professional teeth cleaning every 6 months. In case of increased caries risk or periodontitis, more frequent prophylaxis may be advisable.

faqs.question: Does health insurance cover the costs?
faqs.answer: Many statutory health insurance companies subsidize professional teeth cleaning. Private insurance often covers the costs in full. We are happy to advise you on the options.

faqs.question: Is the treatment painful?
faqs.answer: Professional teeth cleaning is usually pain-free. In case of sensitive teeth or exposed tooth necks, local anesthesia can be used.

faqs.question: What is pregnancy prophylaxis?
faqs.answer: During pregnancy, hormonal changes increase the risk of gum inflammation. Our special pregnancy prophylaxis prevents this and protects mother and child.
